HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 59 Kč. Doprava zdarma pro registrované zákazníky při nákupu od 1 290 Kč.

express_delivery.pricing: Registrovaní zákazníci: 99 Kč (objednávky do 1 289 Kč), 49 Kč (objednávky od 1 290 Kč). Neregistrovaní zákazníci: 99 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: V jakékoliv dm prodejně v ČR
IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Zdarma pro registrované zákazníky, 29 Kč pro neregistrované (pouze expresní vyzvednutí).

express_delivery.pricing: Zdarma pro registrované zákazníky, 29 Kč pro neregistrované.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: dm.cz offers standard and express home delivery, as well as express in-store pickup. Parcel shop and parcel locker delivery are not available. PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled exclusively by DPD. PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 59 Kč, with free shipping for registered customers on orders over 1,290 Kč. Express home delivery costs 99 Kč (or 49 Kč for registered customers on orders over 1,290 Kč). Express in-store pickup is free for registered customers and 29 Kč for others. DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery takes 1-3 business days. Express in-store pickup is ready within 60 minutes. NOTABLE FEATURES: DPD provides a free 'výnos do patra' service, delivering packages directly to the customer's apartment door. Express pickup is a key service, allowing for very fast collection of online orders. Payment on delivery (COD) is not available for in-store pickup. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a single, clear page. It details the costs and conditions for home delivery and in-store pickup effectively. However, it lacks information on weekend delivery schedules and COD surcharges for home delivery. The absence of popular parcel shop/locker options is a significant limitation compared to other e-commerce sites in the Czech Republic.
